venue.address_2: Congress Street across from City Hall
venue.name: Faneuil Hall (in front of the Samuel Adams statue)

item.description:
Updates on Speakers, Times, Events!

Speakers include Edwin Viera, John McManus, Pastor Garrett Lear, Dan Itse, and possibly Ron Paul (!) We also have a number of State Legislators that have been leaders in the State Sovereignty/ 10th Amendment Movement joining us this year. We will their info up soon.

Order Tickets/DVDs: PATRIOT - Patriot Ticket $17.76- General admission ticket to Boston Tea Party at Faneuil Hall on Sat. 12-12-09. Doors open 11am. Event 12-4pm.

FOUNDER- Founder Ticket $100.00 - Intimate private dinner with speakers at the historic Warren Tavern in Charlestown,MA. Friday night 12-11-09 at 7pm. Very limited seats available. Also includes admission to Tea Party on Sat. 12-12-09 12-4 pm.

Committees of Safety are honored to again be hosting this year's Boston Tea Party.

Committees of Safety is a non-partisan, grass-roots advocacy organization active throughout
the 50 United States. Its purpose is to exercise the freedoms of speech, association, and petition
guaranteed by the First Amendment to the Constitution of the United States, in order to educate
Americans about, and mobilize them for political action around, the fundamental principles of liberty
and self-government set out in the Declaration of Independence, the Constitution, and the Bill of
Rights.

http://www.bostonteap...

http://www.committees...

item.name: Boston Tea Party
